about_the_game:
Embark on an Adventure Across the Continent of Arcarnia

The land of Arcarnia is filled with danger and mystery. Take on the role of Prince Kairen of the small kingdom of Estaros and thwart enemies plotting to set the world ablaze. Bring peace to the continent in this epic journey.

  • 2D Tactical RPG

  • Squad-Based Units

  • Over 50 Unique Classes

  • Rich Campaign Exceeding 30 Hours of Gameplay

Turn-Based Exploration Meets Real-Time Combat

  • Explore the land of Arcarnia and develop your domain through a turn-based system that allows for deep strategic planning.

  • Engage in fast-paced battles where multiple squads of units move in real-time, demanding quick and decisive actions.

Develop Your Domain

  • Explore and Strategize : Gather resources and grow as you explore the map.

  • Manage Your Domain : Construct and upgrade buildings to expand your kingdom.

  • Recruit and Train : Produce soldiers of various classes and hire unique heroes with special traits.

Conquer Battles with Real-Time Strategy

  • Experience large-scale operations requiring tactics to outwit your enemies. Seize advantageous terrain, ambush foes in forests, and lead squads of dozens of soldiers to secure victory.

  • Individual units engage in automated combat, while you cast spells and issue attack orders to shift the tide of battle.

  • Liberate villages, secure resources, and increase your fame to sustain your growing army.

  • Maintain your army's morale while breaking the enemy's will to fight.

Recruit Heroes and Overcome Trials

  • Prince Kairen crosses paths with a mysterious girl, Lumine, and becomes entangled in a sinister conspiracy beyond your wildest imaginations.

  • Meet allies and rivals from various factions around the world.

  • Build bonds with companions through the Affinity System and uncover their individual backstories.

  • Embark on a grand journey across Arcarnia, filled with treachery, ambition, and epic storytelling.

About Project RR

Project RR is being developed by a passionate, ambitious indie team of tactical RPG enthusiasts. If you’ve enjoyed titles like Heroes of Might and Magic, Ogre Battle, Unicorn Overlord, First Queen, or the Romance of the Three Kingdoms series, you’ll find this game’s unique mechanics and atmosphere both delightful and refreshing.

name: Project RR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Project RR is a tactical RPG that seamlessly blends turn-based domain management and exploration with unique real-time combat. Guided by an ancient prophecy, develop your domain, lead your legions, and recruit and nurture heroic allies. Restore peace to the continent of Arcarnia.
